name: Assembly Line VR
description:
made by worblir for a virtual reality development class

(game still in development)

For Oculus Quest, download the android build and load it in using SideQuest.

Not sure how well the windows build works on devices other than Oculus.

Description below is temporary

Features
  • Recieve timed build jobs and complete them quickly to make cash
  • In-game UI that appears on a series of old CRT monitors
  • Everything works within the Unity physics system
  • Full build system where players snap together parts to build objects
  • The skateboard has working wheels (pretty gnarly)
Manual Controls
  • GRIP - Hold down grip to grab/release/throw objects with either hand
  • CONTROL STICK - Flick your controller's main control stick to turn
  • TRIGGER - Press your controller's trigger when prompted to begin/reset the game DIRECTIONS
  • Build objects displayed on the monitors within the given amount of time with the parts displayed for each object
  • Submit your completed objects by holding them underneath the green tube to your right and releasing them
